article_title: Campaign Conversations: Arrington, Robertson face off during debate hosted by Tech organizations
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

og.description: The Student Government Association, Tech College Republicans and Tech Student Democrats hosted a debate Monday evening, featuring District 19 congressional candidates Jodey Arrington and Glen Robertson.
